name: Planet Crafter
description:
The invaders are on their way and your confederation of planets is ill prepared to defend themselves. Take charge and improve your planets, crafting a powerful economy and defenses to fight them off.

Each turn you draw a set of five planets. Select three of these to play and spend your resources on improving the other two. Build up your economy and your defenses quickly as there is not much time before the invaders arrive. Each wave of attackers is stronger than the last and has a special effect on the game.

After each wave you will gain a new pair of buildings that are more powerful than those you had before.

Good Luck!
